name: Cuddles: 2 Year Anniversary [24hrs]
description: A 24-hour queer club marathon celebrating Cuddles' second anniversary with an all-star cast including Aaron Blau, Aldonna, Bitter Babe, DJ NORTHERN, and Zeynep. Expect bouncy, multi-genre club cuts spanning house, techno, disco, and more. Described as "an unhinged amount" of energy "for the queers," this Valentine's weekend endurance party represents Berlin's DIY queer club culture at full tilt.
